messages.message: Hey @Aaron Vontell.. here is an example flow from SC: https://dogfood.instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/org1/repo1/fs/Test%20Drive/tests/customer-flow-dev/SC/fetchers/Workflows/CF1.ibflow.. Let me know what the change is. Can we find a way to keep it backward compatible? pls note it's going to be very difficult to convince SC to make change, they have about 30+ custom fetchers and they will go mad :grimacing:

Understood @Hari the change is basically that the input payload would come into Apply Fetcher as something like `"Google, LLC", Google` but then it would be passed to the FetcherContext as `Google, LLC, Google`, so a CSV reader would see it as three items instead of two
